dmca.title: TV DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Google: Android Market

works.description:
Marvel Entertainment, LLC and its  
subsidiaries ("Marvel") is the owner of the copyrights, trademarks, and  
other intellectual property rights in Spider-Man and over 8,000 other  
popular characters. Marvel owns and controls the rights to use and  
merchandise the names, designs, logos and likenesses affiliated with all
of  
its characters and associated properties.

The apps identified in this complaint were not granted any license or  
authorization to use images or any other trademarked or copyrighted  
property involving Spider-Man or any other Marvel characters.
Consequently, these apps infringe Marvel's valuable intellectual property 

rights.
